title: S15 Ep3: SPECIAL BONUS EPISODE:  Playing Dead
itunes:title: SPECIAL BONUS EPISODE:  Playing Dead
description:
True Crime Tuesday is PLAYING DEAD with our guest and survivor, Monique Faison Ross !

Monique, the daughter of San Diego Chargers' football great Earl Faison, married her high school sweetheart, soon after she discovered she was pregnant with his child. Her relationship with Chris was shaky from the start, but turned tumultuous as he became verbally and physically abusive. When she could no longer put up with the abuse, she left him with their children. That was when the stalking and genuine threats began. Nothing stopped himâ€”not protection injunctions, police warnings, or even arrests. This is a story of true terror!

GET HELP WITHOUT SAYING A WORD HERE: https://www.thehotline.org/
1-800-799-7233

Get her book here: https://amazon.com
